text: Scott Hylands DouglasRoy Shields. "B.C. to B'Way-- In a Hurry." Toronto Star, April 10, 1965, p. 31 (born 1943) is a Canadian actor. His career began in 1969. Hylands was born in Vancouver, British Columbia. He appeared in Cannon, The Waltons, Baretta, and Ironside. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Actors from Vancouver
title: Scott Hylands
